mapper.sql: F.IDX AS F_IDX ,F.FILE_ORG_NAME AS F_FILE_ORG_NAME ,F.FILE_SYS_NAME AS F_FILE_SYS_NAME ,F.FILE_GROUP AS F_FILE_GROUP ,F.FILE_TYPE AS F_FILE_TYPE ,F.PIDX AS F_PIDX ,F.DEL_YN AS F_DEL_YN
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, FROM AD A LEFT JOIN COMMON_FILE F ON A.IDX=F.PIDX AND F.DEL_YN='N' AND F.FILE_GROUP='PR/AD' AND F.FILE_TYPE='LIST_IMG' WHERE A.DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY A.IDX DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS ROWNUM, rnum.* FROM (SELECT * FROM AD WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY IDX DESC) AS rnum, (SELECT @RN:=0) AS R ) t2 WHERE (SELECT ROWNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS ROWNUM, rnum.* FROM (SELECT * FROM AD WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY IDX DESC) AS rnum, (SELECT @RN:=0) AS R) D )F WHERE F.IDX = #{idx} ) > t2.ROWNUM AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY t2.ROWNUM DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS ROWNUM, rnum.* FROM (SELECT * FROM AD WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY IDX DESC) AS rnum, (SELECT @RN:=0) AS R ) t2 WHERE t2.ROWNUM > (SELECT ROWNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS ROWNUM, rnum.* FROM (SELECT * FROM AD WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY IDX DESC) AS rnum, (SELECT @RN:=0) AS R )D )F WHERE F.IDX = #{idx} ) AND DEL_YN = 'N' limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE AD SET HIT = (HIT+1) WHERE IDX = ${idx}
